website_summaries.verdict: This air wrench looks great and provides adequate performance levels from a trusted tool manufacturer.
pros: Fast-performing air impact wrench that runs at 10,000 rpm
Small body that's easy to handle in tight spaces
Tool's design modeled after NASCAR racing pit crew tools
Heavy tool that feels solidly built while you're using it
Works well for most jobs around the home, but it doesn't have torque needed for heavy-duty jobs
cons: Limited to 550 ft-lbs of forward torque

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.text: This gun was great while it worked but stopped working 2 months in. I bought the gun with a 4 year warranty which is still “valid” since its only been 4 months now i have had the gun. I have been trying to get it replaced through warranty but keep getting the tun around. I work in a shop so buying tools form honest sellers is key. Sadly this is not the case here. Save ur money and buy a better gun. At this point I may as well have just saved my money and bought a cheeper gun from harbor freight.
customer_reviews.author: Ghulam Abbas

customer_reviews.title: Far better than Snap-on or Matco. Real results worth 1/3 the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Had an Ingersoll 231. Then got Snap-on MG725 and Matco. This impact is far superior to the nearly $700 Snap-on and Matco ones I owned. Lots of power. Comfortable grip. Easily accessible forward and reverse with adjustable torque settings. Comes with protective boot. Ergonomics of grip does not cause hand fatigue like the Snap-on and does not limit grip angle like the Matco. Fantastic product and I recommend this to all other fellow professional technicians.
customer_reviews.author: bp.review

customer_reviews.title: Decent tool for the money
customer_reviews.text: Not as powerful as all the YT videos make it out to be. It would not break one lug nut on my pickup truck... had to use a breaker bar. It was very fast at removing the others... zips them right off.
customer_reviews.author: Dewey Bumstead

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product from a fantastic brand, I love this more than my snap on ones On further use and feel for it, it's a fantastic product for professional use, as we use Gloves anyway & the unmistakable NASCAR pit crew sound to it, be forewarned it's not a toy this thing Can and will snap bolts etc. Secondly it's exhaust throws out down the face over the anvil good thing (bonus for keeping rust off your impact sockets but you should probably wear gloves like a professional!)
customer_reviews.author: USMCninja

customer_reviews.title: Garage Thunder
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one since I first saw them. The sound alone is worth the price. The only small short coming I found is in the socket retaining ring at the very end of the mounting lug. It is not the best design for this type of retainer as it can jam easily. You need to make sure it is fully closed at the split so it doesn't get turned in the socket and jam. .Just took a slight squeeze with the pliers to correct. I would have preferred a spring loaded ball in the side of the boss like most socket wrenches. Other than that it has worked to my satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Vintage Bob

customer_reviews.title: STRONG IMPACT
customer_reviews.text: IMPACT WORKED GREAT.VERY STRONG AND EASY USE, EXCEPT THAT IT IS A LITTLE HEAVY
customer_reviews.author: the goose

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 guns, The other two are from a different company. This one does what i needed it to do. Very powerful. i give this 100% on all aspects of this gun.
customer_reviews.author: Jacknyd

customer_reviews.title: Loud gun, lots of power, good price
customer_reviews.text: Great gun with lots of torque. I use it mostly to remove lug nuts. It is very loud so protect your ears. It's on the heavier side in comparison with other impacts, but for the price I paid, I don't notice the additional pound or two.
customer_reviews.author: KDA

customer_reviews.title: Great impact gun
customer_reviews.text: I love my thunder gun it is awesome replaced myir 230 you got time to delivery this thing is great
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S Stough

customer_reviews.title: The NASCAR “street legal” impact.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used an IR gun for years. I don’t think there’s a better quality gun on the market. The Thunder Gun was an impulse buy and now it’s my go to at work. Mind you I work in a 6 guy Porsche shop. It’s loud. But what do you expect!? It’s the THUNDER GUN. Since I’ve owned the gun, I’ve had zero issues. It’s powerful, very reliable and overall a great gun. Shipping was well within the delivery date. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BCFarrell

customer_reviews.title: Everyday USE!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds like NASCAR, looks like NASCAR, approved by NASCAR. I use this EVERYDAY and hasn't failed me yet. If you are sick of those 750 ft lbs of torque impact guns that just can't remove a lug nut, then you have to get the hammer and breaker bar out just to loosen that lug nut.... Not with this bad boy impact. Never had a lug nut it wouldn't remove.
customer_reviews.author: Just for Fun

customer_reviews.title: Does what needs to be done.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd thunder gun. First one still going strong after more than 10 years. 1st one retired to my home toolbox. It get 5 stars for being loud. I like loud
customer_reviews.author: Craig Borchmann

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of power. LOUD.
customer_reviews.text: This impact wrench is a monster. I use it almost everyday at work. People around the shop are impressed by its power and noise.
customer_reviews.author: em_p_em

customer_reviews.title: Fast and High Torque
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these for our Water Department to bolt up 6" to 36" Ductile Iron pipe, the crews love them for their speed and torque rating.
customer_reviews.author: Spitting Frog

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: All kinds of power! Nut is off rolling on the floor before you can get off the trigger ( on lug nuts)! All kinds of power and Awesome sound!
customer_reviews.author: Seth Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: It isn’t light but it will handle most any job.
customer_reviews.author: Fromeous

customer_reviews.title: Strong gun
customer_reviews.text: Yeah! This thing gets it. I have it on a 3 foot whip hose with a next size up quick connect. Got disconnect at Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: RSL1

customer_reviews.title: Great impact
customer_reviews.text: Great impact. It's not real load. It's got good torque. I've not had any problems yet using it at work. I use the heck out of it. It's light weight.
customer_reviews.author: john Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome air gun!
customer_reviews.text: On the heavy side but boy can it get things done!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up very long
customer_reviews.text: We have a manufacturing facility and put these guns under quite a bit of duress, and this one just couldn't handle the environment. Only lasted about 3 weeks, if it's light duty it would work, but heavy use it's just not tough enough.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Hille

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, Fast and powerful!
customer_reviews.text: This Impact is an excellent made product, everything on it is made top notch. Its fast and powerful. I just wish it came with the little grease gun and grease to maintain it so I dont have to go and spend 30 bucks to buy it. Other than that its an excellent product, great price, and very fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Strong, fast and loud.
customer_reviews.text: Powerful fast impact wrench. Very pleased with its performance and price compared to the 2235QTIMAX I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Wes barrett

customer_reviews.title: Power Up!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son, a heavy equipment diesel mechanic, for his work tool box. He said he's the envy of the shop!
customer_reviews.author: AG Wise

customer_reviews.title: Lots of noise and lots of rpm
customer_reviews.text: Great impact but preaty heavy if your using it all the time but sounds bad ass
customer_reviews.author: Danny luff

customer_reviews.title: Great price, my last one lasted 15yrs
customer_reviews.text: Great price, my last one lasted 15yrs, and was just getting a little tired, so I wanted same gun, found it here
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: great impact
customer_reviews.text: I have several impact guns for work, but this the best one I own for the money. There is nothing I have not been able to break loose with this impact. I think it will be by favorite :-)
customer_reviews.author: Road Warrior

customer_reviews.title: worked great than not so good but its awesome when it ...
customer_reviews.text: worked great than not so good but its awesome when it worked just think i got a bad one stopped and then started u know how it is
customer_reviews.author: Bill Oxner

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Powerful time proven design that is EXTREMELY loud. I keep at as a back up to another, quieter impact.
customer_reviews.author: Greggo

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value & performance
customer_reviews.text: Instantly reminds me of the classic Mac tools 1/2" impact gun that was the industry standard for so many years. It's no lightweight, but has the power necessary for those difficult jobs that the off-brand units just can't deliver. Only initial complaint is the yellow head guard doesn't fit that great and of course being a soft cloth material (vs. vinyl) will not clean up as easily as most standard head guards. If you're looking for a well built unit that pushes out the type of torque it's actually rated for and don't want to spring for high end name brand unit, look no farther, this is by far the best option around in the 1/2" impact gun arena.
customer_reviews.author: John E.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who is starting in his mechanics apprenticeship. In short it does the job and then some. This tool does not disappoint and can handle everything you throw at it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent air tool for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent air tool for the money, i'm an automotive student so all the vehicles i work on are fairly old and rusted but this impact wrench has no problem removing stubborn wheel lugs or rusted on strut bolts, it zips them off with no problem. i've been using it for about a week now and absolutely no problems just make sure you buy a grease gun and some #100 grease for it when you buy it and i'm sure you wont have any problems for the life of the air tool
customer_reviews.author: george lewis

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Pure junk used ten times maybe and started working at half speed in forward position
customer_reviews.author: Josh T.

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Used the tool to take lug nuts off I was amazed at the power took the lug nuts off in seconds great product I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Chris E Stoyeck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good tool has lot of torque well made does what it made for get job done
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Nakao

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday, this is my second. First one made it 13 years.
customer_reviews.author: Darin Bartman

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: Looking at the numbers they post can be deceiving. I used it for lugs and front rotors on a titan. The gun had a hard time getting both off. Ended up having to use a breaker bar to get the bolts loose first. I verified the settings and pressure regulator on my compressor and still had trouble. There's no way this can push what they are claiming. Over all not a "bad" purchase for the price. But as a former mechanic for Toyota and being use to Snap On and MAC guns, this one just doesn't compare. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Good quick delivery  to UK..
customer_reviews.text: Good gun works well good price included import tax so no messing with post office..
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW R.

customer_reviews.title: Impact wrench
customer_reviews.text: This tool is fantastic, never again will I have a stuck bolt that can't be removed. Just chucked my old one in tools to give away. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: Terry.F

customer_reviews.title: Gre gift choice!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband love this gift he uses it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Thunder Gun
customer_reviews.text: One of the Best air guns you can own!!!! Great quality. If your do much automotive work, don't do without one! Everyone that has first hand experienced this one has just fallen in love with it. It does much more than just the standard air impacts. It will definately get the job done when others just can not hack it. ~Snowfazam12~ Gaynell
customer_reviews.author: Snowfazam12

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lots of power and fast as you'll ever need... Bravo IR !! Shipped fast and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: shawn s

customer_reviews.title: Great gun
customer_reviews.text: Great gun, it gets the job done my little craftsman want. Being a auto mechanic i use it a lot, stubborn bolts no problem
customer_reviews.author: Clifford L Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Thundergun Lives up to its name!
customer_reviews.text: Got the Thundergun last week and couldnt wait to try it out, she's loud thats for sure but gets the job done! Very happy with it, very good quality, heavy duty for sure, i work on heavy plant machinery and a few of the other boys have tried it out and were imprssed too, now when i pull it out the toolbox they all chant, " Thunder, na na na naaa na na naa nah!"
customer_reviews.author: Vyper

customer_reviews.title: socket retaining ring came off the first day but this ...
customer_reviews.text: socket retaining ring came off the first day but this thing has the torque to do anything you want to do .........
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: I know I'll be braking things with this gun ( and looking forward to it ) NICE GUN.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most powerful air gun I have ever put in my hands , I have two other guns put this one blows them out of the water , I know I'll be braking things with this gun ( and looking forward to it ) NICE GUN.
customer_reviews.author: Liseldog1

customer_reviews.title: doesnt work well at all
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend purchased this and thought it was going to work great. the seller we purchased from was awesome, so do not think this review is a reflection of them. the Wrench itself worked good one time and the next time he tried to use it, it wouldnt work at all. He got about 5 mins of it, if that. Not happy and will be returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: real power in your hands
customer_reviews.text: This tool has the power to break loose tight fasteners. The tool is well made and worth every penny. I wish I had two of them. IR really knows how to build an impact wrench. I guess IR fixed the leaky fitting problem, b/c mine did not hiss when I installed my hose fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M. Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool with a lot of torq. It should be called a speed gun because it's so fast. Very rugged to do the heavy jobs. I really like the speed, however adjusting the speed could be a lot easier if it had a selector instead of the set screw, the first time I adjusted it I had to use a screw driver, but I guess because it is rugged that's the option the manufactor used for adjustments, a little heavy, I definitely recommend it. A very good tool.
customer_reviews.author: stickkens

customer_reviews.title: Good impact. Little bit on the heavy side compared ...
customer_reviews.text: Good impact. Little bit on the heavy side compared to most impacts on the market today but definitely gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: For the money and what we use this impact for, you can't beat it. We train students for pit crews and we use these impacts all the time. Strong,and high speed are what we look for and thats what we get with the 232TGSL.
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: To look good is important as well
customer_reviews.text: It completely met my expectations. It's powerful, it works great and it looks great. The only thing you need to look at is the size of your compressor and the hose. It really needs a lot of air but if the environment is equipped for that it brings a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: das_kruemelmonster

customer_reviews.title: ... there's cuz Ingersoll rand was supposed to be the best gun out the
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of there's cuz Ingersoll rand was supposed to be the best gun out the.. well let me tell you.. in 6 months the gun changes speed. On its own.. and I got the run around trying to get it fixed. And it is still not fixed. I'll never buy from tool topa again. I have bought many tool from them.. not anymore. .
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: My Techs love it.
customer_reviews.text: We use this everyday in our shop for taking of Zero Turn Mower Blades. My Techs love it.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome !.. i love this thing .. its powerful , loud and reliable..just like me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best impact for the money and I have owned or ...
customer_reviews.text: Best impact for the money and I have owned or used just about all of them for the past 36 years.
customer_reviews.author: mtmvette

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gun, this is my 3rd one. Wouldn't buy any other
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely phenomenal product. Love the power. Highly recommended. Way more power and speed than I thought. Got bolts off with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Marks

customer_reviews.title: i love my new toy
customer_reviews.text: The price,price,price in these hard times,its cool to see the real price and free shiping.you'll have everything we need at your fingers
customer_reviews.author: guadalupe deleon

customer_reviews.title: Great Power and feel!
customer_reviews.text: We all buy cheaper guns to get started on our tool acquisitions. I replaced an old Rockwell my dad gave me with this IR. Real happy with it !
customer_reviews.author: Mark Moses

customer_reviews.title: Ingersoll
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, powerful gun. I like to work with it and it's surely worth that money i spent for.
customer_reviews.author: Maciej

customer_reviews.title: The Thunder Gun
customer_reviews.text: Most powerful impact I have ever handled. The textured grip is great when you have oil and grease on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: William Stewart

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: my son was very excited to get the impact wrench for xmas.he goes to tech school and he has it there already to use thanks
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Buy it now, you won't regret it
customer_reviews.text: I nicknamed this impact the "thunder dome" nothing gets in its way. By far the best purchase I've made in my toolbox. When it's been awhile and you just need to get your nut off, this is the tool for you. You can feel the power with every pill of the trigger. Please keep in mind you need the proper air to back it up. She will deliver. No blue balls from this girl. She finishes every job.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gould

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this gun for 2 years now. I'm a mechanic at the DPW where we have over 1500 peices of equipment from cars to heavy duty payloaders I use this gun every day and it is just as powerfull as the day I bought it.I looked around before I bought it and locally it was about $100 more . Great gun!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy Ingersoll Rand what else is there to say lots of power
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful torque
customer_reviews.text: it sounds really good ...I'm a tech working on cars for more than 20 years and this is really worth it I'll definitely buy it again just hear the sound of it is impressive the way this gun works.
customer_reviews.author: Leokev23

customer_reviews.title: Great gun but be careful
customer_reviews.text: Great gun, lot's of torque. No problem with any rusty or wheel lugs as of yet. This is my second. The first didn't feel any less powerful but wouldn't (stopped) breaking free wheel lugs and actually started leaving them loose. It had about three years of shop use on it.
customer_reviews.author: mark walker

customer_reviews.title: ... owned a IR 231 for 20 yrs and was happy hope I get the same Mileage out of this ...
customer_reviews.text: Increadable Gun owned a IR 231 for 20 yrs and was happy hope I get the same Mileage out of this one , also this was the best price world wide
customer_reviews.author: Kurt R Bryson

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this My husband orderd for work and twice it messed up on him we orderd a new one and also messed up It will work great at first but won't last
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Fantabolus Wrench
customer_reviews.text: This wrench has unbeleivable power !!! Bring on the nuts that will not come off, because I have an answer for them now.
customer_reviews.author: tukeah

customer_reviews.title: Gun is great. Noise is too loud
customer_reviews.text: Gun is great. Noise is too loud. I cannot disagree with the price, however, the noise is unavoidable. Great product but the shop thinks that the noise is obnoxious. .
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Chinese lack of quality!
customer_reviews.text: What could be a reasonably priced product with ample power suffers from several quality issues. Ingersoll-Rand should be recognized for quality tools throughout their price range. This Chinese manufactured product, however, has a combination of extremely rough surfaces as well as poorly designed and difficult to use controls. The nut at the base of the grip used for supply air also has a sharp edge that presents a hazard to a user's hand. Ingersoll-Rand has manufactured impact wrenches that are far more user friendly. My recommendation, upgrade to a much better model or buy another brand!
customer_reviews.author: svenska

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy and where the air blows out at is dumb I feel like I got robbed wish I never bought it. If the wheels have gravel dust on em all that dust gets in your face. Go buy a 1200 nitro Cat . Seller please contact me so I can send this junk back in to get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy wilson

product_meta.title: Ingersoll-Rand 232TGSL 1/2-Inch Super-Duty Air Impact Wrench Thunder Gun
product_meta.description:
Ingersoll-Rand 232TGSL 1/2-Inch Super-Duty Air Impact Wrench Thunder Gun

AMAZON.COM
Do you want to get as close as you can to a NASCAR pit crew without setting foot on a pro track? Then the Ingersoll Rand 232TGSL 1/2-Inch Super-Duty Air Impact Wrench Thunder Gun is the choice for you.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Ingersoll-Rand 232TGSL 1/2-Inch Super-Duty Air Impact Wrench Thunder Gun is our fastest 1/2-inch impact wrench... and as close as you can get to the real racing tools preferred by NASCAR tire changers. It features 625-foot--pounds of torque in reverse, with 10,000 rpm to deliver pit crew power, speed, and durability for shop tasks.

See more
feature_bullets: Distinctive appearance, similar to IR Thunder Gun racing tool
The Ingersoll Rand fastest 1/2-inch impact wrench available
625-feet-per-pound of maximum reverse torque; 550-feet-per-pound of forward torque

specifications.Warranty Description: 1 year from date of purchase with sales receipt or invoice
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars198 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
